'''High-Quality Rice''' is a Quest Item obtained during the "[[Contraption-Contrived Cooking Course: Part II]]" Event [[World Quest]]. One copy of this item will automatically be added into the player's [[inventory]] and will then be given to [[Cloud Retainer]].
